title: She Becomes You
description: Like a feral cat she stalks her prey. Her mind is proof she is sick, twisted and a killer. A psychopath, broken at birth and when she bears fruit the apple doesn't fall far from the tree.  There is nothing quite like a psychopath who wants to be your friend. A friend that will turn on you, use you and stab you in the back. She has no conscious, no morals or normal emotions and she is determined to get what she wants.You won't see her coming, until its too late!When, in her mind....She Becomes You!
author: O.G. Tomes
